name: ActionListener
description: This is an action listener used by scripts or other classes Events sent by a threaded action listener, only dispatched while a script is running. Listener is stopped on script stop, and reset on new script start. New Injections required to use

methods.name: onAction
methods.signature: default void onAction​(MenuRow eventRow, int mouseX, int mouseY)
methods.description: Event method called with the menu row for the event and the mouse X and mouse Y values
